concept.title: Element selection options
concept.shortdesc: These options are available for selected elements

conbody.section: Select All It allows all the elements on the canvas to be selected. This option is always available.
Delete selection This will remove these element(s) completely from the canvas. The option is available for one or more elements selected.
Clear selection This performs the same action as pressing Escape Key, it clears all your current selections. The option is available for one or more elements selected.
